title: My Husband Wasn't Helpful
description:
Anna is upset that her husband didn't jump in and help her manage their 15-month-old daughter at a recent pool party. - Dr. Laura: "Men are very direction-oriented so simply ask for what you want."

How good is your husband at reading your mind? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
